articles.title: National Folk Games Contest of Schoolchildren
articles.content:
National Folk Games Contest of Schoolchildren
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- A national folk games contest of schoolchildren (January 22-26) is going on at Kim Il Sung Square and other places of Pyongyang on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day.
					Participated in the contest are hundreds of schoolchildren selected at the folk games contests held in Pyongyang City and Jagang, Ryanggang, North and South Phyongan and other provinces.
					
					The participants give full play to their stunt and technique, leaving deep impression on the spectators.
					
					The kite-flying contest includes team event in which ten players from each unit fly and manipulate kites simultaneously, the event of flying kites higher, the event of showing kite-flying stunt and the like.
					
					In the shuttlecock playing contest the players compete how long they kick a shuttlecock without letting it fall to the ground and what stunts they show while playing it. Among the events of the national contest are rope skipping, kkoni game and counting sticks game for improving composure, minute observation and mental faculties. The contest shows well the vivacious and optimistic life of the schoolchildren.
					
					Since every Saturday was set as day of playing folk games at all middle and primary schools last year, the folk games became more popular among the schoolchildren.

articles.title: Pyongyang Greeting Card and Souvenir Shop Abustle with Crowds
articles.content:
Pyongyang Greeting Card and Souvenir Shop Abustle with Crowds
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Greeting Card and Souvenir Shop is crowded with customers on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day.
					To exchange New Year's cards is a custom of the Korean people.
					
					At the shop one can buy New Year's cards, birthday cards and wedding congratulatory cards, postcards and folk-crafts.
					
					Kye Yong Ae, chief of the shop, told KCNA: 
					
					The shop is always abustle with customers.
					
					It is an aspect of the emotional life that people exchange congratulatory letters and souvenirs, wishing the addressees health, happiness and success in work.
					
					We are striving to serve varied and unique greeting cards and souvenirs to the customers to meet their growing emotional demand.

articles.title: 35th Jongilbong Prize Skating Contest of School Youth and Children Held
articles.content:
35th Jongilbong Prize Skating Contest of School Youth and Children Held
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The 35th Jongilbong Prize Skating Contest of school youth and children across the country was held here from January 21 to 23 on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 The contest divided into the group of middle school pupils and the group of primary school pupils brought together at least 400 boys and girls selected in different areas.
					
					 Boy skaters of Chonggye Middle School in Rason City, girl skaters of Majon Middle School in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province, and boys of Yongnam Primary School in Kilju County, North Hamgyong Province, and girls of Hungdok Primary School in Hungdok District of Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, separately placed first in team standings.

articles.title: Reception Arranged for Officials of Chinese Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Reception Arranged for Officials of Chinese Foreign Ministry 
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing arranged a reception for officials of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Jan. 22 on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Present there on the invitation were Hu Zhengyue, assistant to the foreign minister, and other officials of the said ministry.
					
					 Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of the DPRK embassy were present there.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobats Awarded Gold Prize
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobats Awarded Gold Prize
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Acrobats of the DPRK were awarded the best prize at the 33rd Monte Carlo International Circus Festival held in Monaco.
					 They presented aerial trapeze "Treble somersault in flight" in which they flawlessly performed four back turns and other difficult feats requiring high technique. 
					
					 At an awarding ceremony held on Jan. 20, the gold prize, the best prize of the festival, was conferred on the aerial trapeze. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a silver prize was conferred on the physical acrobatics "Horizontal bar and flying from the swing."

articles.title: KCNA Refutes U.S. Sheer Fabrication
articles.content:
KCNA Refutes U.S. Sheer Fabrication
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. intelligence and plot-breeding organizations recently malignantly slandered the DPRK in a report of the U.S. National Intelligence Committee on the international healthcare issue.
					 In the report they asserted that the healthcare issue is very serious in the DPRK. As if it were not enough with this, they floated the cock-and-bull story that the army’s combat capability and its loyalty to the government are waning.
					
					 This has lashed the army and people in the DPRK into great fury as it is malignant vituperation which can be spelled out only by those keen to hurt the inviolable socialist system and the single-minded unity of the DPRK, considering them as a thorn in the flesh.
					
					 It is an open secret that the ill-famed intelligence and plot-breeding institutions of the U.S. including the CIA are hell-bent on releasing false reports about its hostile countries. 
					
					 This time, too, they let loose sheer sophism that “those who died of chronic diseases account for 40 percent of the mortality in north Korea” and “tuberculosis, scarlet fever and measles are the most serious medical problems”, a serious distortion of the health condition of the people in the DPRK. This can not but be sophism making profound confusion of right and wrong.
					
					 Anyone who has even an iota of common sense about medicine and the public healthcare system in the DPRK may know well that what they claimed is nothing but a whopping lie.
					
					 In the DPRK where everything serves the people, medicine precisely means preventive medicine. Everybody benefits from the free medical care under the most popular and advanced healthcare system. Such things which the plot-breeders claim to be established facts are inconceivable in our society.
					
					 Even during the '"Arduous March,” the forced march, the Korean people firmly defended the socialist healthcare system, a legacy bequeathed by President Kim Il Sung to them out of patriotism, not yielding to the increased pressure of the hostile forces. 
					
					 It is the unpopular healthcare system in the U.S. which should be overhauled or replaced by a new one. 
					
					 In the U.S. where money is everything preventive medicine is not in force because more medicine can be sold only when more people get sick.
					
					 According to data available, the U.S. is said to have highest doctor's fee. If one wants to go to hospital in the U.S. one should be medically insured. But a great many poor people cannot afford to pay insurance. The number of such people reached 45.8 million in 2004 and 47 million in 2007.
					
					 The same is the case with those who are medically insured because the insurance keeps soaring along with doctor's fee. 
					
					 The insurance accounted for 27.4 percent in the wage of a worker in 2000 but it swelled to 30.2 percent in 2008, making the people's living harder. 
					
					 The “medical insurance”, therefore, is nothing but a noose to strangle people and, as a result, the mortality due to diseases is on the steady increase in the country.
					
					 No wonder VOA, referring to the corrupt healthcare system in the U.S. in last November, deplored that those countries opposed to the U.S. often refer to the vulnerable medical system in the country whenever they jeer it because this country is infamous for the poor health condition of people and its poor medical system.
					
					 The U.S. intelligence institutions must know this. However, they released the false report, finding fault with the advantageous healthcare system in the DPRK in a bid to hurt the prestige and dignity of the DPRK in the international arena and stir up "ill feelings" in the society. 
					
					 The more ridiculously the dishonest forces of the U.S. behave, talking about “medical problem”, the more firmly the army and people of the DPRK will defend Korean-style socialism, closely united around the party and the leader.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Stop Reckless Suppression of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Stop Reckless Suppression of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' reckless crackdown on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and compatriots in Japan is the never-to-be-condoned crime against humanity as it is not only a product of the policy based on extreme ultra-nationalism and national chauvinism prompted by their hostility towards the DPRK and Koreans in Japan from A to Z but a manifestation of their wrong stand and attitude towards the unprecedented crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people during the past colonial rule.
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The articles cites specific facts to prove that the issue of Korean residents in Japan is a serious issue which still remains unresolved as it was spawned as the aftermath of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea and because of the Japanese reactionaries' wrong handling of it in collusion with the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique. It is also a matter which assumes more serious nature as the Japanese reactionaries have pursued a hostile policy towards the DPRK, thus spreading contempt and bitterness towards the Koreans and fostering social prejudice in the Japanese society.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Nowhere in the world is plagued with such harsh chauvinism and open terrorism against other nationalities as Japan.
					
					Japan is ill-famed for its savage suppression of Koreans in Japan and human rights abuses and the arch advocate of national chauvinism. What matters is that the Japanese authorities are creating a grave situation under the pretext of the "abduction issue", "missile threat," etc. with an eye to intensify the crackdown upon Chongryon and Koreans in Japan. This is clearly evidenced by their campaign for fanning up bitterness towards the DPRK and Chongryon and Koreans in Japan in its society and their frantic moves against them. 
					
					The Japanese reactionaries, however, should bear in mind that Japan can never evade the responsibility for the issue of Koreans in Japan but should immediately drop its hostile policy towards Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and honestly fulfill its obligation.

articles.title: Moves for War of Aggression against North Blasted
articles.content:
Moves for War of Aggression against North Blasted
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military staged an exercise of an assault air brigade targeted against the DPRK on Jan. 2 and on Jan. 8 held what they called "joint seminar" attended by at least 300 brass hats of the three services of the army, the first of its kind since its founding, kicking up anti-north war hysteria. Meanwhile, the puppet warmongers are contemplating the creation of an Apache helicopter squadron under the pretext of coping with somebody's "provocation". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed commentary in this regard: All these moves are dangerous provocative moves for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK as they are very disturbing military moves arousing serious concern of the public  at home and abroad.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The military rackets being ceaselessly kicked up by the Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea can never be overlooked as they can be seen only on the eve of a war.
					
					 The Lee group has bedeviled the favorably developing inter-Korean relations, opposing the national reconciliation and unity which all the Koreans desired and pursuing the wild ambition to militarily stifle the DPRK at any cost in league with foreign forces, and rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula so tense that a war may break out any time. This group can never evade the responsibility for these crimes. The Lee group's act of escalating the military provocations against the DPRK at a time when the inter-Korean confrontation is festering is as dangerous as adding fuel to the fire. 
					
					 The reckless moves of the puppet warmongers to ignite a war in a bid to realize their wild ambition in league with foreign forces will only precipitate their own destruction. 
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have already declared that they would decisively foil the reckless moves of the Lee group to escalate the confrontation and start a war with the matchless military force built up by dint of Songun. 
					
					 The provocateurs will have to pay a dear price for their military rackets, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Revive Dictatorship Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Revive Dictatorship Flailed
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the puppet public prosecutor general of south Korea asserted that strengthening the "basic liberal and democratic order" is the most fundamental precondition for weathering economic slump. The minister of Justice, too, prattled that provision of “strict security” should be a precondition for "economic recovery."
					 Minju Joson in a signed commentary Saturday brands this as a revelation of the sinister intention to strengthen the fascist dictatorial system under the pretext of "economic recovery."
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the worsening economic crisis in south Korea is a product of the unpopular misrule of traitor Lee Myung Bak, the commentary says:
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee Myung Bak group is calling for "strengthened basic liberal and democratic order" and "provision of security". This is an outright challenge to the people.
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by the group is to revive the fascist dictatorship and then mercilessly crack down upon people protesting against the traitorous rule.
					
					 The "economic recovery" touted by the group is nothing but a pretext to mercilessly suppress people in their struggle for independence, democracy and reunification by further strengthening the fascist dictatorship while shifting the blame for the deteriorating economic crisis on to others. In other word, the group is frantically working to stamp out the movement for democracy and reunification and deprive people of their right to existence under the signboard of "economic recovery."
					
					 The south Koreans will get nothing from the Lee Myung Bak "pragmatic fascist government".

articles.title: Vigorous Struggle for National Reunification Urged
articles.content:
Vigorous Struggle for National Reunification Urged
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- All Koreans should resolutely stand against the anachronistic anti-DPRK moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, keeping in mind the truth that independent reunification, peace and prosperity depend on the patriotic struggle for condemning and decisively frustrating such reckless confrontation moves. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The United States seeking to achieve its strategic aims through the division of the Korean Peninsula and the anti-reunification traitors in south Korea finding their way out in the north-south confrontation dislike the progress of the movement for national reunification while making desperate efforts to check it, the article points out, and says:
					
					 Without nationwide struggle for foiling such anti-reunification moves of the separatists at home and abroad is it impossible to achieve the historic cause of national reunification. 
					
					 The Korean nation has an excellent tradition in which it braved adversity and paved the path with struggle in the movement for national reunification. 
					
					 It is the Korean nation that directly undertakes the movement for national reunification, and no one can replace it in this struggle. All Koreans who love the country and are concern about the destiny of the nation, whether they be in the north, or in the south or overseas, should struggle in firm unity, regarding the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as the guidepost for national reunification and the common action program, irrespective of differences in ideology and ism, religious belief, political view, classes and strata.
					
					 Many difficulties and trials are still lying in the way for national reunification, but bright is the prospect of independent reunification, peace and prosperity. Neither outsiders' interference in the problem of reunification and their obstruction, nor anti-reunification moves of the sycophantic traitorous forces going against the desire of the times and the nation can check the dynamic advance of the Korean nation towards independent reunification, peace and prosperity, the article concludes.

articles.title: Struggle against Killing of Evacuees Goes on in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Killing of Evacuees Goes on in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- A candlelight struggle against the fascist Lee Myung Bak group's brutal killing of evacuees is going on in south Korea.
					 A candlelight rally and demonstration were held in Ryongsan, Seoul on Jan. 22.
					
					 The speakers at the rally accused Lee Myung Bak and the "Grand National Party" of seeking to railroad Lee's evil bills through the "extraordinary session of the National Assembly" in February by downplaying and concealing the recent murder. They bitterly denounced the Lee regime for mulling holding a "NA confirmation hearing" to appoint the chief of the Seoul District Police Office as chief of the Police Agency though he spearheaded the operation to kill evacuees, in particular. 
					
					Stating that they can no longer live under the Lee regime, they called on the people to pool their efforts to probe the truth behind the incident and punish the murderers. The rally was followed by demonstration.
					
					 In Pusan 29 political parties, civic and public organizations and student organizations including the Pusan City Party of the Democratic Labor Party and the Pusan Headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) jointly held an emergency press conference outside the building of the Pusan District Police Office on Jan. 21 at which they urged the authorities to take immediate measures to guarantee the living of the evacuees.
					
					 Meanwhile, the KCTU, the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea, the Headquarters of the Anti-Lee Myung Bak Struggle of Chosun University, the Federation of University Student Councils in Southern Area of Kyonggi Province under the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils, the 17th-term Student Federation of Literature and Art of Hanyang University, the General Student Council of Chonnam National University and the Anti-U.S. and Anti-Lee Myung Bak Movement Headquarters in Kwangju and South Jolla Province also issued statements on Jan. 20 and 21 in protest against the fascist clique's killing of evacuees.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Anti-Reunification Acts Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Anti-Reunification Acts Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The South Side Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea' Reunification issued a statement titled "We oppose the Lee Myung Bak group's Cabinet reshuffle aimed to drive the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase" on January 20. 
					 The statement referred to the fact that Hyon In Thaek, professor at Korea University, whom Lee is set to appoint as minister of "Unification", was involved in shaping the confrontational policy, the keynote of which is "no nuke, opening and 3,000 dollars."  Lee's intention is nothing but a declaration of a war as it is designed to pursue the hostile policy towards the DPRK in all aspects, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The authorities' persistent insistence on the above-mentioned policy at a time when the military tension is increasing in this land and the inter-Korean relations are in the crisis of total severance is little short of doing harm to the destiny of the nation.   
					
					 If the Lee regime pursues the confrontational policy dating back to the era of the Cold War in utter disregard of the cherished desire of fellow countrymen for peace and reunification and requirements of the times and the nation, the people will be left with no option but to struggle against the regime.

articles.title: Rally for Peace and Disarmament Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rally for Peace and Disarmament Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held the 86th rally for achieving peace and disarmament outside the building of the puppet Ministry of National Defence on Jan. 20. 
					Speakers at the rally accused the authorities of stepping up the confrontation policy towards the DPRK for the last one year as evidenced by the fact that they replaced the "CONPLAN 5029" by an operational scenario aimed at invading it, totally denying the historic inter-Korean joint declarations, and formed a "working mechanism for non-proliferation" designed to put it into practice. 
					
					 Recalling that military warmongers including the minister of "National Defence" are recently working hard to stockpile cluster bombs repudiated and condemned worldwide, they declared that those who are carried away by consciousness of confrontation should be thrown into the dumping ground of history.
					
					 A resolution read out there stated that the organizations would launch a vigorous struggle for peace on the Korean Peninsula in order to foil the provocative and bellicose anti-DPRK confrontational policy of the "government" and the "Ministry of National Defence."

articles.title: Preparatory Committees for Commemorating Day of Sun and Feb. 16 Formed Abroad
articles.content:
Preparatory Committees for Commemorating Day of Sun and Feb. 16 Formed Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, were formed in Tajikistan, Cambodia and Austria with due ceremonies between Jan. 14 and 16.
					Kurbonzyon Mirzoyeva, secretary of the Sogd Regional Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of royal palace of Cambodia, and the general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK were elected chairmen of the committees at the ceremonies. 
					
					The Tajik and Austrian preparatory committees decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the February holiday.
					
					The Cambodian preparatory committee set the period from March 15 to April 15 and the period from January 16 to February 16 as commemoration and celebration periods and decided to widely introduce through media the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the cause of human independence and hold colorful political and cultural events during the periods.

articles.title: 35a Competencia sobre hielo por Copa Pico Jongil
articles.content:
35a Competencia sobre hielo por Copa Pico Jongil
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 21 al 23 en esta capital la 35a Competencia  Nacional sobre Hielo de Jovenes y Ninos Escolares por la Copa Pico Jongil consagrada al dia de  fundacion de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					 La  competencia  se realizo  dividida en la rama de escuelas secundarias y en la de primarias bajo la participacion de mas de 400 jovenes y ninos escolares seleccionados en distintos lugares del pais.
					
					En este evento los jugadores de la Escuela Secundaria Chonggye de la ciudad de Rason, las jugadoras de la Escuela Secundaria Majon de la ciudad de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, los jugadores de la Escuela Primaria Yongnam del distrito de Kilju de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y las jugadoras de la Escuela Primaria Hungdok del municipio homonimo de la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur ocuparon primeros lugares en clasificacion general, respectivamente.

articles.title: ATCC refuta informe de EE.UU. que calumnia sistema sanitario de Corea
articles.content:
ATCC refuta informe de EE.UU. que calumnia sistema sanitario de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ATCC) -- A traves del informe sobre la asistencia medica mundial, publicado recientemente a nombre del Comite Nacional de Inteligencia de Estados Unidos, los organos de inteligencia inventores de complots de este pais censuraron siniestramente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En ese documento, ellos calificaron de grave el problema sanitario de la RPDC y disparatearon que esto "esta debilitando la combatividad del ejercito y su fidelidad al gobierno".
					
					Pone sumamente indignados al ejercito y al pueblo de la RPDC esa difamacion de quienes estan tan molestos por el sagrado regimen socialista y la unidad monolitica de ella y ansiosos por destruirlos. 
					
					Es un secreto desclasificado que la Agencia Central de Inteligencia y otros connotados servicios de la misma indole de EE.UU. toman en el centro de sus trabajos la campana demagogica contra los Estados hostiles.
					
					En el informe arriba mencionado, ellos tergiversaron seriamente la situacion de la salud de los habitantes coreanos mintiendo que "en el Norte de Corea 40 % de los muertos en total fueron causados por las enfermedades cronicas" y "la tuberculosis, la fiebre escarlata y el sarampion devienen uno de los mas graves problemas sanitarios".
					
					Sabra bien cuan pueril es este embuste el que conozca, aunque un poquito, de la ciencia medica y el sistema de salud publica de la RPDC.
					
					La medicina de nuestro pais, donde todo sirve para el pueblo, es la profilactica. Bajo el sistema sanitario mas popular y avanzado, todos los habitantes viven sanos con una larga esperanza de vida beneficiandose de la asistencia medica gratuita.
					
					En nuestra sociedad resultan inimaginables esos rumores que los conspiradores estadounidenses inventan y difunden como si fueran hechos consumados.
					
					En los periodos tan dificiles como la "Marcha penosa" y la forzada, nuestro pueblo defendio firmemente su sistema socialista de salud publica, herencia del Presidente Kim Il Sung, signada de calido amor por la patria y por el pueblo, resistiendo la creciente presion de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Lo que hay que arreglar o erradicar es precisamente el anti-popular sistema de salud publica de EE.UU.
					
					En esta sociedad capitalista, donde lo todopoderoso es el oro, no se practica la medicina preventiva porque es posible vender mas medicamentos si las personas se enferman.
					
					Segun datos disponibles, EE.UU. es el pais donde actualmente es mas costoso a escala mundial el tratamiento medico. 
					
					Ademas, para recibir una consulta en el hospital, hay que contratar el "seguro medico".
					
					Los estadounidenses pobres impotentes de asegurarse se totalizaron en 45 millones 800 mil en 2004 y en 47 millones en 2007.
					
					La situacion de los asegurados es tambien dificil debido al incesante crecimiento de la prima y los gastos del tratamiento medico. 
					
					En particular, la vida de los obreros se torna cada vez mas depauperada por la prima que crecio el ano pasado al 30.2 % del salario desde el 27.4 % del ano 2000. 
					
					En fin de cuentas, el sistema del "seguro medico" no pasa de ser una horca para asfixiar a las personas y crece la mortalidad por las enfermedades. Esto es la realidad de EE.UU.
					
					Deplorando tal corrupto sistema sanitario, la propia VOA reporto que los "paises oponentes a EE.UU. se refieren a menudo al imperfecto sistema sanitario norteamericano cuando se burlan de el". 
					
					Lo sabran tambien los servicios de inteligencia de EE.UU.
					
					Sin embargo, ellos divulgaron las referidas versiones fraudulentas acusando el ventajoso sistema de salud publica de nuestro pais porque abrigan la mala intencion de enturbiar la autoridad y el prestigio de la RPDC en la escena internacional y sembrar en el interior de esta algun "resentimiento".
					
					A pesar de las ridiculas acciones de las fuerzas malvadas de EE.UU. como la acusacion a la RPDC del "problema de asistencia medica" y otros, nuestro ejercito y pueblo defenderan firmemente el socialismo al estilo coreano uniendose compactamente en torno al partido y al lider.

articles.title: Japon es responsable del problema de coreanos residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Japon es responsable del problema de coreanos residentes en Japon
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ATCC) -- La brutal represion de los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los coreanos radicados en este pais isleno es un producto de la politica de extremado chovinismo nacional y ultranacionalismo, que parte de la hostilidad a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y a la comunidad coreana en Japon.
					Este imperdonable crimen anti-etico resulta una muestra de la erronea posicion y actitud de los reaccionarios japoneses en cuanto a los inauditos crimenes cometidos por el imperialismo japones contra el pueblo coreano en el periodo de dominacion colonial sobre Corea.
					
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					El problema de los coreanos residentes en Japon surgio como consecuencia del colonialismo japones sobre Corea y queda pendiente hasta la fecha por culpa de los reaccionarios japoneses que lo gestionaron mal en complicidad con los imperialistas norteamericanos y la camarilla titere surcoreana.
					
					Este asunto se torna mas grave y delicado porque actualmente, los reaccionarios japoneses fomentan en la sociedad el prejuicio sobre los coreanos sembrando el desprecio y la hostilidad a estos mediante la ejecucion de la politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					En el mundo no hay otro lugar como Japon donde se practican abiertamente la politica chovinista mas terrible y el terrorismo contra otras naciones, en particular, la represion a los coreanos y la violacion de sus derechos humanos.
					
					Lo peor del caso es que las autoridades japonesas recrudecen su campana contra la RPDC, la Chongryon y la comunidad coreana en Japon justificandola con el "problema de secuestro", la "amenaza de misiles", etc.
					
					Japon debe saber una vez por todas que no podra liberarse jamas de la responsabilidad del problema de los coreanos residentes en ese pais isleno y cumplir con sinceridad sus deberes tras cancelar inmediatamente su politica hostil a ellos y la Chongryon.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a los belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a los belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun condena al circulo militar titere del Sur de Corea que calenta el clima belicista contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 El pasado dia 2, la brigada aerea de ataque del Sur de Corea desplego un ejercicio tomando a la RPDC por su blanco y el dia 8, mas de 300 generales de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas sostuvieron el llamado "seminario conjunto" por primera vez desde que se fundo el ejercito titere surcoreano, precisa el comentarista y continua:
					
					 Por otra parte, los belicistas surcoreanos planean formar un nuevo batallon de helicopteros ofensivos "Apache" pretextando la "provocacion" de alguien.
					
					 Todo esto es un sospechoso movimiento militar, que causa la seria preocupacion dentro y fuera del pais, siendo una grave provocacion encaminada al ataque preventivo contra la RPDC.
					
					No se pueden pasar por alto esas sucesivas acciones militares de la banda de Lee Myung Bak que se ven solo en visperas de la guerra.
					
					Esta camarilla no podra eludir jamas la responsabilidad criminal de haber roto las relaciones intercoreanas, que se desarrollaban favorablemente, y llevado la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a una situacion tan critica, que puede dar lugar a la guerra en cualquier momento, negando la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales que desea toda la nacion coreana y persiguiendo la ambicion de lanzar la agresion militar contra la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					 La horda de Lee echa la gasolina en el fuego al recrudecer su campana de provocaciones militares a la RPDC justamente cuando esta mas agudo que nunca el enfrentamiento entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					 Si los belicistas surcoreanos siguen buscando la guerra en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras para realizar su necia ambicion, seran arruinados mas temprano.
					
					 Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC ya habian declarado que frustrarian implacablemente con las invencibles fuerzas armadas, consolidadas en virtud del Songun (priorizacion militar), la campana provocativa militar de la banda de Lee que esta loca por la confrontacion y la guerra.
					
					 Los provocadores tendran que pagarlo muy caro.
